Description.Text: Set in the trendy Chelsea neighborhood of exciting Manhattan, minutes from the Empire State Building, this hotel offers friendly services including a free daily breakfast. This is a 3 star accommodations Accessible to many local attractions Close proximity to business district Close proximity to historic district Location: Conveniently located in Chelsea

• The Institute of Culinary Education - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi • Flatiron Building - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi • Madison Square Park - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi • Madison Square Garden - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi • Empire State Building - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • Macy's - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi • Times Square - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 1.6 km / 1 mi • Chrysler Building - 1.7 km / 1 mi • Broadway - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi • Brooklyn Bridge - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi • Central Park - 5 km / 3.1 mi • Ellis Island - 6.4 km / 4 mi • Statue of Liberty - 7.5 km / 4.6 mi

This 19-story hotel has 144 guestrooms, all of which feature Hampton Inn’s Cloud Nine bedding: comforter (bedspread) with white cover, choice of feather or foam pillows, and a lumbar pillow. Clock radios are easy to use and help guests find their favorite music.Guestrooms also offer complimentary wireless and wired high-speed Internet access; cable/satellite TV with HBO; coffeemakers; and complimentary local calls. Microwaves and refrigerators are available upon request.

Hampton Inn Manhattan Chelsea features guestrooms with refrigerators and free high-speed internet access. After a restful night's sleep in a comfortable Cloud Nine bed, guests can work out in the fitness center or work in the business center. Within walking distance of the Chelsea Hampton Inn, guests will find Times Square, Madison Square Garden and the Jacob Javits Convention Center. Additional attractions, including the Intrepid Air and Space Museum, are within one mile (1.6 km) of the hotel.

From 495W: Take the left lane through Midtown Tunnel, exit tunnel and bare left towards downtown, left at first light (E35 Street), right on 2nd Avenue, right on 23rd Street, right on 8th Ave, right on 24th Street, hotel is 2 blocks on right.
From 495E (Lincoln Tunnel): Exit tunnel and merge to Lincoln Tunnel Expressway / 30th Street, Make right on 7th Avenue, left on 24th Street. Hotel is 1 block on right.
From Holland Tunnel: Enter tunnel right lane, exit tunnel keep all the way to the right, make right on Hudson Street and get in far left lane. Left on Canal Street, right on 9A North (West Street), right on 23rd Street access road, left on 8th Avenue, right on 24th Street, hotel is 2 blocks on right.

A complimentary hot breakfast is provided each morning; items such as sausage patties and eggs are served. The hotel does not have its own restaurant, but there are several dining options within the surrounding area.
Nearby restaurants: • Mustang Harry's • Café Torino • Monster Sushi • Eighteenth and Eighth • Cuba Libra
Exceptional service to you and your family are the trademark of the Hampton Inn Manhattan/Chelsea Creating an exciting vacation experience; you will be impressed with accommodations and amenities
